title: Simulated Cancer Datasets
text: package contains simulated datasets various clinical cancer research areas. following simulated datasets available: bc_rt_data: Simulated data overall survival breast cancer radiation therapy

what: Simulated data on overall survival from breast cancer with radiation therapy — bc_rt_data
title: Simulated data on overall survival from breast cancer with radiation therapy — bc_rt_data
text: data simulated context use post-mastectomy radiation therapy women pathologic stage T1-2N1M0 breast cancer. Data various patient disease characteristics available.

title: Simulated data on overall survival from breast cancer with radiation therapy — bc_rt_data
Simulated data on overall survival from breast cancer with radiation therapy — bc_rt_data
text: data frame 3,000 rows 13 columns: time Overall survival time years event Death indicator, 1 = dead, 0 = censored rt PMRT indicator, 1 = yes, 0 = age_dx_yrs Age diagnosis years tumor_size_cm Tumor size cm grade Tumor grade, , II, III n_ln_pos_3_vs_1or2 Number positive lymph nodes, 1 = 3, 0 = 1 2 nodal_ratio Ratio number positive lymph nodes number sampled lymph nodes lvi Lymphovascular invasion, 1 = yes, 0 = er_or_pr_pos ER/PR status, 1 = ER+ PR+, 0 = ER- PR- her2_pos Her2 status, 1 = positive, 0 = negative quadrant_inner_vs_other Tumor location, 1 = inner quadrant, 0 = quadrant (centeral, outer, multiple) optimal_systemic_therapy Receipt optimal systemic therapy, 1 = yes (endocrine therapy ER+ PR+, trastuzumab Her2+, CHT ER- PR-), 0 =
